DocAttribute.Name: BaseSurface
DocAttribute.Documentation: Surface defining side of half space.

DocAttribute.Name: AgreementFlag
DocAttribute.Documentation: The agreement flag is TRUE if the normal to the BaseSurface points away from the material of the IfcHalfSpaceSolid. Otherwise it is FALSE.

DocAttribute.Name: Dim
DocAttribute.Documentation: The space dimensionality of this class, it is always 3
